# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This exceptional item is valued at $15000 to us, reflecting its unique features, durability, and the expertise that went into its creation. We believe it could be an invaluable addition to your collection or business, offering unparalleled benefits and satisfaction. Considering its worth and potential impact, we kindly invite you to consider purchasing it at this exclusive price. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of serving you with this remarkable product. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $15,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $15,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $15,000
